TestCase.CaseDescription: Inserting user with duplicate email address Expected error: Can not add due to UNIQUE constraint on email
TestCase.SQLScript: insert into Users (userId, email, firstname, lastname, password, roleId, majorId) values ('64015c46-6724-11e5-b364-0a184912e379', 'test@cmpe272.com', 'admin', 'admin', PASSWORD('123abcd'), 1, 1);
